Desert Warrior Heavy Armor Set
kDesc

The complete Desert Warrior Heavy Armour Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Desert Warrior Armour Set: 
 
 1. Desert Warrior - Heavy Combat Body Armour 
 2. Desert Warrior - Heavy Combat Boots 
 3. Desert Warrior - Heavy Combat Gloves 
 4. Desert Warrior - Heavy Combat Helmet 
 5. Desert Warrior - Heavy Combat Leg Armour [#Legal]

L'ensemble complet Armure lourde Desert Warrior, avec les cinq éléments composant l'ensemble Armure Desert Warrior complet : 
 
 1. Desert Warrior - Gilet de combat lourd 
 2. Desert Warrior - Bottes de combat lourdes 
 3. Desert Warrior - Gants de combat lourds 
 4. Desert Warrior - Casque de combat lourd 
 5. Desert Warrior - Jambières de combat lourdes [#Legal]

Das komplette mittelschwere Rüstungsset Desert Warrior; dieses Bündel enthält alle fünf Bestandteile der kompletten Desert Warrior-Rüstung: 
 
 1. Desert Warrior - Panzerweste für schwere Kämpfe 
 2. Desert Warrior - Stiefel für schwere Kämpfe 
 3. Desert Warrior - Handschuhe für schwere Kämpfe 
 4. Desert Warrior - Helm für schwere Kämpfe 
 5. Desert Warrior - Beinrüstung für schwere Kämpfe [#Legal]

Set completo di armatura pesante Desert Warrior, contiene i cinque componenti che compongono l'intero set di armatura Desert Warrior: 
 
 1. Desert Warrior - armatura per il corpo da combattimento pesante 
 2. Desert Warrior - stivali da combattimento pesante 
 3. Desert Warrior - guanti da combattimento pesante 
 4. Desert Warrior - casco da combattimento pesante 
 5. Desert Warrior - armatura per le gambe da combattimento pesante [#Legal]

El set completo de armadura pesada Desert Warrior, contiene las 5 partes que componen la armadura: 
 
 1. Desert Warrior - Armadura corporal de combate pesada 
 2. Desert Warrior - Botas de combate pesadas 
 3. Desert Warrior - Guantes de combate pesados 
 4. Desert Warrior - Casco de combate pesado 
 5. Desert Warrior - Armadura de combate pesada para pierna [#Legal]

완전한 사막의 전사 방어구 세트입니다. 사막의 전사 방어구 세트를 완성하는 다섯 개의 아이템으로 구성되어 있습니다:
 
 1. 사막의 전사 - 강화 전투 상체방어구 (남성)
 2. 사막의 전사 - 강화 전투부츠 (남성)
 3. 사막의 전사 - 강화 전투장갑 (남성)
 4. 사막의 전사 - 강화 전투헬멧 (남성)
 5. 사막의 전사 - 강화 전투 하체방어구 (남성) [#Legal]

 1. Desert Warrior - Heavy Combat Body Armor (Men)
 2. Desert Warrior - Heavy Combat Boots (Men)
 3. Desert Warrior - Heavy Combat Gloves (Men)
 4. Desert Warrior - Heavy Combat Helmet (Men)
 5. Desert Warrior - Heavy Combat Leg Armor (Men) [#Legal]
